text:
- Hi, I'm Brian Tan,
chief scientist of Carro.
I'm leading the data science
and engineering department here.
Founded in 2015,

Carro is the largest car
marketplace in Southeast Asia
and a home-grown brand
synonymous with efficient car sales
at competitive prices.
We harness AI powered technology,

to transform the car buying
and selling experience.
We have been cloud-native on

AWS since the inception
of Carroll in 2015.
So in pricing, what we had before,

were basic analysis of car
prices within the market,
and we project that forward

to get indication of what
pricing would be like for cars
that we were going to buy and sell.

The potential of machine-learning
becomes apparent.
It has the ability to look beyond
just the rudimentary analysis.

And were able to pick up
deeper truth into the market
that we might not have factored
into our analysis in the first place.
This gives us better insights
and predictions into the prices
compared to our peers.

This yielded an entirely new
machine learning driven model,
that we continuously innovate
and improve to its current form
which we use to price our cars,

and that also enabled us
to reduce the time required
to get back to customers.

The vast amount they
thought in our possession,
are ingested into AWS SageMaker

via process pipeline involving
the Lambda functions,

which is triggered periodically
via Amazon Eventventbridge.
This provides the foundation for a robust
and dynamic car valuation system,
utilizing cloud computing functionalities

to provide a highly
market-reactive service.
We also saw reduced costs,
more efficient resource allocation
in data storage and access,
better scalability with our infrastructure
and data analysis converge in the cloud,

all of which has helped us to
provide more diverse services

and deliver a more seamless
customer experience.
The Carro business is growing rapidly
with our active collaboration with AWS,
there's an increasing need for us to hire
skilled Data Science talents.
Carro undertakes this commitment to

technological innovation
and the development
of the data science in Singapore

by launching the Carol
X Amazon Scholarship.

The establishment of the Carro
X Amazon scholarship program
will enable Carro to be a quality pipeline
of cloud enabled talent.
Carro and AWS are aligned
on data driven approach

to working backwards
from our customers needs,

and delivering a world-class
customer experience

enabled by the cloud and
artificial intelligence.

We look forward to
extending our work together

to training the next
generation of tech talent,
specialized in Data Science
and Machine Learning in Singapore.
